sentences.en: All the girls nodded and said "Hi"
sentences.cn: 所有的女孩都点头招呼道：“嗨!”

sentences.en: All this equipment has received international acclaim from the specialist hi-fi press.
sentences.cn: 这套设备受到全球高保真音响专业报刊的赞誉。
他咧嘴笑了笑，挥挥手说：“嗨！”

sentences.en: Hi there! I haven’t seen you for ages.

sentences.cn: 嘿, 芭芭拉, 你好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hi, guys. How are you doing?
If you're buying a new hi - fi , shop around for the best price.
sentences.cn: 你要是买新高保真音响,要货比三家买最合算的.

sentences.en: Oh, hi there. You must be Sidney.
sentences.cn: 喂，你好。你一定是西德尼吧。

sentences.en: She said "hi" with the blithe assurance of someone who knew how much she'd been missed.
sentences.cn: 她高兴地说了声“嗨”，好像确信大家非常想念她似的。

sentences.en: You can connect the machine to your hi-fi.
sentences.cn: 你可以把机器连在高保真音响上。

words.tran_cn: 嗨！（表示问候或用以唤起注意）

trans.tran_cn: 夏威夷群岛的书面缩写，（=high intensity）高强度
